scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin && npm run copy-builds
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Building backend...' && cd backend && npm install --production
scripts.build:frontend: echo 'Building frontend...' && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:admin: echo 'Building admin...' && cd admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy-builds: echo 'Copying builds...' && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist backend/public/frontend && cp -r admin/dist backend/public/admin && echo 'Copy completed' && ls -la backend/public/
